entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low plus 1 except minus 1 inland.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to rain near midnight. Freezing rain inland overnight. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low plus 1 except minus 1 inland. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon then west 50 gusting to 70. High plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Saturday 18 March 2023
